words.name: Assimilation
words.definition: Cultural assimilation is the process whereby a minority group gradually adapts to the customs and attitudes of the prevailing culture and customs.
words.question: Does the success of your design assume that a target population will assimilate into the dominant culture? How can you ensure that your design respects the distinct cultures of the people that you are designing for?
